DBTComponent.content:
import subprocess
import sys
import os
import tempfile
import shlex

git_clone_command = "git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/abhisheks-prophecy/test_repo_sql_public.git --branch __PROJECT_RELEASE_VERSION_PLACEHOLDER__ /tmp/DBT_0/c6070ae8-f9f4-40d6-bd59-5d32a9a1c0f9"
dbt_working_dir = "/tmp/DBT_0/c6070ae8-f9f4-40d6-bd59-5d32a9a1c0f9/test/env/test_prophecy/sql_test_databricks_2"
dbt_commands = ['''dbt  deps --profile run_profile''','''dbt  seed --profile run_profile --full-refresh''','''dbt  run --select +env_test_model_1_jobstest+ --profile run_profile --full-refresh''']

def run_dbt():

    def get_secret():
        try:
            return dbutils.secrets.get("prophecy_jobs_1793", "SQL_TestJobDB_2_Disabled-25060-DBT_0-64849351")
        except Exception as e:
            print("Couldn't get secret")
            return ""


    secret = get_secret()
    db_token = ""
    git_token = ""
    semi_colon_hit = False


    for ch in secret:
        if (ch == ';'):
            semi_colon_hit = True
        elif (semi_colon_hit):
            git_token = git_token + ch
        else:
            db_token = db_token + ch

    secret = ""

    def move_profiles_to_current_dir():
        if (True):
            dbutils.fs.cp("dbfs:/FileStore/prophecy/artifacts/prophecy/test/__PROJECT_ID_PLACEHOLDER__/latest/SQL_TestJobDB_2_Disabled/DBT_0-64849351/profiles.yml", "file:/tmp/DBT_0/c6070ae8-f9f4-40d6-bd59-5d32a9a1c0f9/test/env/test_prophecy/sql_test_databricks_2/profiles.yml")

    def add_token_to_profile():
        with open("/tmp/DBT_0/c6070ae8-f9f4-40d6-bd59-5d32a9a1c0f9/test/env/test_prophecy/sql_test_databricks_2/profiles.yml", "r+") as f:
            data = f.read()
            data = data.replace(f'{{{{ TOKEN }}}}', db_token)
            f.seek(0)
            f.write(data)
            f.truncate()

    def run_cmd(cmd, cwd, env = os.environ):
        try:
            output = subprocess.check_output(shlex.split(cmd), stderr=subprocess.PIPE, cwd=cwd, env=env)
            print(output.decode())
        except subprocess.CalledProcessError as error:
            print(f"The command failed with exit status {error.returncode}")
            print(f"Error message: {error.stderr.decode()}")
            sys.exit(1)

    def clone_repo():
        # Create a temporary script to output the token
        with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w', delete=False) as f:
            f.write(f'#!/bin/sh\necho {git_token}\n')
            os.chmod(f.name, 0o700)
        # Set the GIT_ASKPASS environment variable to the path of the script
        env = os.environ.copy()
        env['GIT_ASKPASS'] = f.name
        # Clone the repository
        run_cmd(git_clone_command, cwd=".", env=env)
        # Clean up the temporary script
        os.unlink(f.name)

    clone_repo()
    git_token = ""
    print("Repository clone complete")

    move_profiles_to_current_dir()

    add_token_to_profile()
    db_token = ""

    print("Running dbt commands")

    for cmd in dbt_commands:
        run_cmd(cmd, dbt_working_dir)

    ## clean up profiles.yml immediately

run_dbt()
DBTComponent.profileContent:
run_profile:
  target: profile_target
  outputs:
    profile_target:
      type: databricks
      schema: qa_database
      host: dbc-147abc45-b6c7.cloud.databricks.com
      http_path: /sql/1.0/warehouses/2a749dbcfe3681e6
      token: {{ TOKEN }}
      catalog: spark_catalog
